article: The only thing that troubled me more than the pain in my back that morning was my worries about money. I'd been excited to visit my sister--Therese, but all I could think about was how I'd hurt my back and had to  _  down my hours at work. "Why don't we make Mom's cake?" she said. "Mom  _  to make this kind of cake for all of us. It will  _  you up."
